projects.name: Photo Exhibiter
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Bootstrap 4
projects.description: A social network for photographers. Features include:  browse, post, edit, cancel(soft delete) exhibits, attend/unattend exhibits, and notifications. Architecture: CQRS/DDD inspired.

projects.name: Rollei Shop
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Semantic UI
projects.description: An ecommerce shop. Features include: Browse catalog, manage shopping cart, and checkout order. Architecture: CQRS/DDD inspired.

projects.name: Dapper University
projects.description: The wonderful Contoso University sample project, written in dapper. I used this to learn dapper and to improve my understanding of SQL.

projects.name: Growler
projects.technologies: MONO/Suave(F#), SQL Type Providers, UI Kit
projects.description: A social network similar to twitter. Features include: browse and send growls, follow other users.

projects.name: SimpleBlog
projects.description: A mini blogging platform. Features include: browse, post, edit, and delete blog posts, follow/unfollow bloggers, send private messages, and notifications.

projects.name: Filmogram
projects.description: A social network similar to instagram/flickr. Features include: browse and post photos, like photos, comment on photos, follow/unfollow other users, and notifications.

projects.name: RangeFinder Review
projects.description: A review webiste. Features include: browse, submit, edit, and delete reviews, comment on reviews.

projects.name: Zuiko Shop
projects.description: A SPA frontend for a camera store.

projects.name: Film Shop
projects.description: A SPA frontend for a film store.
